data.title: Clarence & Eileen Summers Scholarship
data.meta_description: ABOUT First Baptist Church members, Clarence & Eileen Summers, established this scholarship to provide much-needed college scholarships for graduating seniors or current college students who are...
data.text:
ABOUT

First Baptist Church members, Clarence & Eileen Summers, established this scholarship to provide much-needed college scholarships for graduating seniors or current college students who are members of the First Baptist Church and/or Cascade Christian Church.

ELIGIBILITY

To qualify for the scholarship, the applicant must be a current or former high school student who is an active member of the First Baptist Church in Burlington and/or Cascade Christian Church in Mount Vernon, and who plans to attend or is currently attending college. The scholarship will be awarded based on financial need.

FUNDING AMOUNT

The scholarship is a one-time award, amount determined annually. The scholarship is renewable, but an application must be completed each year.

APPLICATION OPEN:

November 1, 2023 - April 1, 2024

Application Questions/Requirements:

Basic Student Information (may upload resume or list of all activities)

Student Photo and Applicant ID

Relationship to the First Baptist Church in Burlington or Cascade Christian Church in Mount Vernon (character limit: 5,000)

Describe a challenge in your life and what you learned from it (character limit: 5,000)

Number of members in household

Number of family dependents attending college next year

Describe a highlight of your school or sports involvement (character limit: 5,000)

Signed Letter of Recommendation

High School Transcript and Cumulative GPA

SAT and/or ACT Cumulative Scores (optional)

Electronic Signature & Date

APPLICATION DUE:

April 17, 2024

APPLY NOW
